column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Lyon lose at home ; drop out of Champions League
#Text=Tuesday , March 6 , 2007
#Text=Olympique Lyonnais 0(2 ) 2(4 )
#Text=AS Roma
#Text=Match Stats
#Text=Attendance 41000
#Text=Goalscorers for Olympique Lyonnais
#Text=None Goalscorers for AS Roma
#Text=Totti ( 22 ) , Mancini ( 44 )
#Text=Bookings ( Olympique Lyonnais )
#Text=Tiago , Cris , Kallstrom , Fred ( Yellow ( 4 ) )
#Text=Bookings ( AS Roma )
#Text=Perrotta , Pizarro ( Yellow ( 2 ) )
#Text=A full crowd showed up at the Stade de Gerland in Lyon earlier today , only to watch their home side fall to Roma of Italy .
#Text=The previous leg in the series saw the two teams draw 0-0 which gave Roma a slight advantage from the start , as a draw would allow them to advance .
#Text=The previous match was extremely undisciplined , and Roma was given eight yellow cards .
#Text=The Italian side showed a much calmer demeanor this game , earning only two yellows in comparison to Lyon 's four .
#Text=Lyon produced the first chance of the game as Romas keeper Alexandre Doni was unable to cope with Juninho , but defender Philippe Mexes was able to clear the ball from nearby strikers .
#Text=Roma had their own chance soon after , as Daniele De Rossi was left open , and he headed the ball home .
#Text=The goal was disallowed by the referee after he spotted a push by De Rossi on Eric Abidal .
#Text=Juninho continued to threaten Roma , but his crosses were not able to do any damage to the Rossinari .
#Text=Lyon fell behind on 22 minutes when Max Tonetto clipped a cross into the middle , and Francesco Totti was in the right place to head the ball past Gregory Coupet .
#Text=Crosses continued to be the only attack Lyon could muster , and they produced a good chance off a Juninho corner kick .
#Text=The ball ricoched off several players before Squillaci latch on for a shot , but the ball was sent directly at Doni , and the keeper made the save .
#Text=Mancini then doubled the visitors lead just before halftime .
#Text=After some quick stepovers to fool Anthony Reveillere , he struck the ball soundly into the top corner of the net .
#Text=After the break , Roma could have killed off the game indefinitely , as Tadei beat Lyon 's offside trap , but was unable to regain the composure required to smash the ball home .
#Text=Doni then produced a few saves for Roma , kicking out Sylvan Wiltord 's shot , and then diving to palm away a curling shot by Juninho .
#Text=Both teams then made vain attempts for a penalty , but both Fred and Perrotta diving , but the referee made the right decisions and awarded only a yellow to Perrotta .
#Text=Fred was then given a yellow for cruelly smashing Chivu in the face with his arm .
#Text=Fred was lucky to receive a red for his actions .
#Text=Roma held on for the win , and the 5 time french champions bowed out of the Champions League .
